when you're busy
when you're working
when you are relaxing

description: explain the function of expression of agreement!

expression of guilty
expression for emotion
expression the feeling

description:
Person A: "The government should impose stricter regulations on tech companies to protect user data."
Person B: "I agree. Stricter regulations are needed to ensure better protection of personal data. What is Person B’s stance on regulating tech companies?

answers.description: Person B believes regulations should be less strict.
Person B agrees that stricter regulations are needed for data protection
Person B disagrees with stricter regulations
Person B is unsure about the need for stricter regulations
Person B thinks existing regulations are sufficient.

description: Choose the correct response to agree with the statement: "Community mutual aid is a distinctive feature of our national culture."

I completely agree, as mutual aid is part of our tradition
I don’t care about this issue.

description:
Person A: "Remote work is the future of the workplace, and it should be adopted by all companies."
Person B: "I think that remote work has its benefits, but it’s not suitable for every industry or role." What is Person B’s view on remote work?

answers.description: Person B is indifferent to the idea of remote work
Person B acknowledges the benefits but believes remote work is not suitable for every industry
Person B believes that remote work should be avoided
Person B disagrees with the concept of remote work altogether.
Person B fully supports remote work for all companies.

description:
Person A: "I think we should implement a four-day workweek to improve productivity and employee satisfaction."
Person B: "I disagree. A shorter workweek might actually reduce productivity and increase stress as people try to complete their tasks in less time. What is Person B's stance

answers.description: Person B believes that a shorter workweek might reduce productivity.
Person B is indifferent to the idea of a four-day workweek.
Person B agrees with Person A’s suggestion.
Person B thinks that a four-day workweek will definitely improve productivity.
Person B supports a longer workweek instead.
